text: 2048 is a single-player puzzle video game made by Italian website maker Gabriele Cirulli and put on GitHub. The main goal of the game is to slide tiles with numbers on a grid to add them to create a tile with the number 2048, but you can keep playing after you reach that number. title: 2048 (video game)
